CMR Bangalore School of Business - [CMRBSB], Bangalore

College_Summary: CMS Business School, an integral part of Jain (Deemed-to-be University), is India's leading business school with an international perspective. CMS Business School offers an MBA program in the discipline of Human Resource Management, Finance, Marketing, Business Analytics, Banking, and Finance, etc.

College_Name: Don Bosco Institute of  Management Studies & Computer Application - [DBIMSCA], Bangalore
College_Summary: Don Bosco Institute of Management Studies & Computer Application (DBIMSCA), Bangalore is a private institute approved and accredited by AICTE and NAAC. It is affiliated to Bangalore University and offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Management, Commerce and Computer Applications. Admission to DBIMSCA depends on the performance of the candidates in National entrance examinations. The faculty at the institute are highly qualified and well experienced.

College_Name: Dr. Ambedkar Institute of Management Studies, Bangalore

College_Summary: GEMS B School, Bangalore is awarded “Most preferred B School for Placements” by ASSOCHAM Award 2020. The institution has tie-ups with International universities and corporates which enable students to have internationally acclaimed UG/PG degrees. Students have been successfully placed in well-known companies such as Aditya Birla, American Express, Capgemini, Amazon, Genpact, Infosys, HP, HDFC, etc. GEMS offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in Business Administration. Admission is done on the basis of marks obtained in the entrance test conducted by the institute.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Business Administration [BBA] + Master of Business Administration [MBA]

College_Name: Haranahalli Ramaswamy Institute of Higher Education, Hassan
College_Summary: Haranahalli Ramaswamy Institute of Higher Education is a premier management institute located in the district Hassan of Karnataka state. It is named after the great educationalist and Gandhian Sri. Haranahalli Ramaswamy. The main vision of HRIHE is to emerge as an institute of excellence by providing bright career opportunities to students who are globally competitive. Its mission is to impart value based education and provide a conducive atmosphere for overall development of students. It is continuously working hard to make its students excel in the field of management. It has well-designed curriculum and syllabus that are carefully designed.

ICFAI Business School (IBS), Bangalore, set in India’s IT hub, is a constituent of ICFAI University which is recognized by UGC. The college provides career oriented and innovative education in the discipline of Management. IBS Bangalore, established in 1995, offers postgraduate and research programs across various specializations for a duration of 2 years. Admission to the IBS is done on the basis of state and national-level entrance exams.

College_Name: Imperial College of Business Studies - [ICBS], Bangalore

Indo Asian Academy Degree College, Bangalore

College_Summary: IZee Business School, Bangalore is backed by one of India’s leading recruitment companies, IZeeManpower. It is ranked 11th Best B-School in South India and 34th Best B-School in India by Silicon India 2016. The institute offers various courses including BBA, BBA Aviation, BCA and MBA with a strategic advantage to capitalize on the numerous prospects. Admission to the institute is done through IZee Business School aptitude test, PGCET, CAT, NMAT, KMAT, XAT, etc., and the overall academic record of the candidates.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Master of Business Administration [MBA] (Global) + Post Graduate Programme in Management [PGPM]

College_Name: Kousali Institute of Management Studies - [KIMS], Dharwad
College_Summary: Kousali Institute of Management Sciences, Dharwad was established in 1976. It is affiliated to Karnataka University, Dharwad and approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. The vision of the institute is to be a model business school and be in forefront of business education, consultancy and research. The mission of the institute is to prepare young managers with commitment to profession and loyalty towards the organization they work for, and train them to play the role of genuine change agent with a strong sense of business ethics. The institute is located at Dharwad, Hubli which is well connected to nearest business hubs in Bangalore (422 kms), Mumbai (600 kms), Goa (210 kms), Pune (420 kms) by roadways and railways & Hubli is the nearest airport.

College_Name: M.P. Birla Institute of Management - [MPBIM], Bangalore
College_Summary: M.P. Birla Institute of Management (MPBIM) was established under the aegis of Bharatiya Vidya Bhawan trust and founded by Kulapati Dr. K.M Munshi. It is situated in Bangalore, Karnataka. The institute offers MBA degree on the basis of MAT/CAT/CMAT/PGCET score. The institute ranked 21st in Non-IIMs survey All India basis and 9th in South India.

It has a very good and high reputation in the city of Bangalore , even outside the Bangalore. The college has the spacious and big building, which are well equipped and clean as well.  The college endeavours in the field of Bachelor of education studies by the help of its highly qualified, efficient and dedicated teaching staffs. Their collective efforts to infuse courage and confidence in the students have given the institution outstanding results. BES offers other courses such as Bachelor of Science, bachelor of computer application, bachelor of commerce, bachelor of business management, etc. This institution has secured 98 to 100 percent first classes especially for the last five years.

College_Summary: Ramakrishna Institute of Moral and Spiritual Education, (RIMSE), Mysore, established in the year 1974 as a private educational institute. RIMSE Mysore, Karnataka offers a B.Ed program along with the provision of other training programs such as Communication, Basic Computer Understanding and Yoga, and other curricular activities. The admission to the course is based on merit. Application mode is both online and offline.

Ravi College of Education was established in 2003. The College is offeres Post Graduate (B.Ed.) program and under Graduate (D.Ed). This is a co-educational college. The College is approved to Bangalore University. This College is recognized with National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE). The college nurtures an open attitude to integrate the Knowledge. The mission of this college is to provide access to excellent educational opportunities for the intellectual, cultural and physical development of a diverse population through degree programs that meet the economic development needs of the region.

Regional Institute of Education, Mysore is one of the five institutions established by NCERT in 1963. The institute offers various Undergraduate, Postgraduate, PhD and diploma courses. It offers B.A B.Ed and B.Sc. B.Ed courses at undergraduate, M.Ed and M.Sc.Ed at postgraduate and PhD in Education, Psychology and Botany at doctorate level. It also offers diploma courses.

The library is well equipped with 12567 books, 21educationalJournals/periodicals, 40 encyclopedias and seating capacity in reading room about 100 students. The college has Laboratories like Psychology, Chemistry, Language lab and computer lab with 15 systems and LAN Terminals.

College_Summary: Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham, Mysore is one of the five campuses of Amrita Institute. The Institute is approved by University Grants Commission (UGC) and accredited with ‘Grade A’ by National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham offers various UG, Integrated, PG and PhD courses in the field of Art, Science and Education.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Computer Applications [BCA] + Master of Computer Applications [MCA]

College_Summary: Bangalore University is located in the Silicon Valley of India – Bangalore, Karnataka. It is recognised by the UGC and accredited with an ‘A’ grade by the NAAC. Bangalore University is ranked 64th among top universities in India by NIRF. Bangalore University has 48 PG Departments, a Post Graduate centre at Kolar, 4 constituent colleges, and 684 affiliated colleges. Additionally, there are various other Centres & Directorates of higher studies & research under its umbrella. Check Bangalore University Affiliated Colleges

Central University of Karnataka is one of the youngest central universities established by the Indian government in 2009. CUK campus is spread across 654 acres of land in the Kalaburagi district of Karnataka. The central university of Karnataka offers UG, PG, and PhD programs in the fields of Arts, Humanities, Social Sciences, Management, Sciences, and Engineering.

Gulbarga University, Kalaburagi is functioning since 1970 as a postgraduate center of Karnataka University. The main campus sprawls over 860 acres and is situated at Gulbarga City. The university has a total number of 38 PG departments & 4 PG Centers. This State University is bestowed with 160 faculty members, together with 700 technical & non-technical staff. Gulbarga University has 305 colleges under its affiliation in which every year students enroll in several courses. Over the past years, the university has bagged ‘Grade B’ accreditation by NAAC and approval from UGC. Check: Gulbarga University Courses & Fees

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Library and Information Science [B.Lib.I.Sc]

College_Summary: Jawaharlal Nehru Centre for Advanced Scientific Research (JNCASR) is a premier research institute located in Bangalore, India. Established in 1989, JNCASR is accredited by the NAAC with an 'A' grade, and it has been recognized as a "Centre of Excellence" by the Department of Science and Technology (DST) and the UGC.

Kannada University, also known as Hampi University, was established in 1991 in Hampi, Karnataka. The University offers undergraduate, post-graduate, post-graduate diploma, integrated, and doctorate courses in various fields. These include MA., Ph.D., Integrated courses (Kannada Literature and Folklore), Diploma in Sculpture, Diploma in Music (Sangeetha), BA (Sangeetha) and Bachelor of Fine Arts (BFA). Admissions to UG courses are based on merit in qualifying examination, while an entrance examination is conducted for PG courses. The application mode for admission is offline.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Master of Arts [MA] + Ph.D. (Kannada literature and Folklore)

College_Summary: Established in 1949 and gaining the title of a statutory university in 1950, Karnatak University is the second oldest university of Karnataka providing quality education over the years. There are 5 constituent colleges offering UG and PG courses in science, arts, commerce, fine arts, law and education. The institution has been consistently ranked at the 90th -95th place by the QS India University rankings and is amongst the top 550 colleges in Asia according to the Asian University rankings 2020. It is officially recognized by the UGC and has received Accreditation from the NAAC.

The Karnataka State Law University was established in 2009. It is the single largest federal university in the country with 92 affiliated colleges under its umbrella. The university offers various UG, PG, and Research-based programs. The courses include 5 years' Bachelors of Arts in LLB, BBA, LLB, and BBA, LLB (Hons.), Double Degree integrated courses, and LLM in Intellectual Property Rights, Constitutional Law, International Law Business and Trade Law and Criminal Law. Admissions to these courses are merit-based as well as entrance-based. The admission criteria may vary from college to college. The majority of the Graduates from the university are placed in top-recruiting companies such as Wipro and IBM.

College_Summary: Karnataka State Open University(KSOU) is located in Mysuru, Karnataka. It is a State Public University founded on 1 June 1996. It came into force as an Act of State Legislature in 1992. The university is approved by UGC. KSOU is a premier place for Open and Distance Learning programs. Working professionals, homemakers, or students who seek part-time jobs can attend these programs and can gain higher education.

College_Summary: Established in 1987, Kuvempu University is a state university located in Shimoga, Karnataka. The university is UGC approved, NAAC accredited with ‘A’ grade. Kuvempu University is one of the best institutes for pursuing higher education in the state of Karnataka. It gained 101st rank in NIRF 2020 and 94th rank QS 2020. The university provides undergraduate, postgraduate and doctorate level programs across a wide range of specializations. Kuvempu University has 35 postgraduate departments in the Faculties of Arts, Commerce, Education, and Science and Technology. The institute also provides distance education programs.

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 1 Reviews

College_Summary: Mangalore University is a premier university in Karnataka. It is a public university located in Mangalore. The university imparts higher education in the field of Arts, Commerce, Science, Law, and Management. It has grown impressively since its inception with 190 Affiliated Colleges including two constituent colleges. Admission to the university is both merits as well as entrance-based. The MBA admissions at the university are based on Karnataka PGCET exam scores and the cut-off for the same is 7005 for the General category students. Graduates from the university are placed in top-recruiting companies such as Dell, Ernst & Young, HDFC Bank, ABB, etc.

The University of Mysore, also known as Mysore University, is a prestigious public-state university located in Mysore, Karnataka, India. The University is recognized by UGC and accredited with a grade ‘A’ by NAAC. The National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) ranked Mysore University 44 in the University category and 71 in the Overall category in 2023.

D. level, across- arts, science, education, social work, commerce, and management streams. The university offers Bachelor, Master and Research Programmes in Medical and Engineering field. It has 3 affiliated colleges including Sri Siddhartha Medical College, Sri Siddhartha Institute of Technology and Sri Siddhartha Dental College.

Tumkur University, established in 2004, is one of the most renowned State University of Karnataka. It is a part of the Bangalore University established to provide education to the students coming from the district of Tumkur. The University is Deemed to be a 'B' grade University by the NAAC.
University of Agricultural Sciences (UAS), Bangalore was established in the year 1964. The University offers 8 undergraduate programmes in the Agriculture sectors.

The university has given a boost to the Kannada culture which can be followed by other linguistic states of India. It is situated at Gotagodi surrounded by Sahyadri range on the west and Northern Maidan on the east.

Founded in 2003, Karnataka State Akkamahadevi Women’s University, Bijapur, formerly known as Karnataka State Women's University (KSWU) has seventy women’s colleges affiliated to it. At present, DDE offers more than 30 courses in various disciplines at different levels such as Postgraduate, Undergraduate, and Diploma. The university has been ranked 73 among the top colleges and universities in NIRF 2019 rankings.

The Directorate of Distance Education, Bangalore University was established in the year 1976. Presently, it is running BA, B.Com., BBA at the UG level, MA, M.Com., M.Sc. courses at the PG level. Besides this, there are also Diploma, PG Diploma & Certificate courses. The courses are offered in Correspondence, Open University scheme & External scheme through distance mode. There are 39 study centres in Karnataka to provide quality education to the students.

College_Name: University of Law College, Bangalore University, Bangalore
College_Summary: University Law College, popularly known as ULC Bangalore is the prestigious law college instituted at Bangalore. India Today has ranked this college in 14th position among India’s Best Law Colleges 2017. It offers BA+LLB, LLM at the UG and PG level, and also a Ph.D. program at the Research level.

The main idea was to promote research and consultancy in management. Christ University has been ranked 50th among the top private B-Schools in India by IIRF Ranking 2024.

College_Summary: BGS Global Institute of Medical Sciences or BGSGMIS was established in 2012 in Bangalore, Karnataka. It is one of the leading and the most popular privately established medical colleges in Karnataka.

The college provides courses in Bachelor of Science (B.Sc), Post Basic Bachelor of Science (P.B.B.Sc), Master Of Science (M.Sc), General Nursing & Midwifery(GNM). The admission to these courses is merit-based. However, to take admission in a B.Sc course one should have a valid NEET score. The application mode is offline.

PES College of Pharmacy [PESCP], Bangalore, Karnataka is a private college that is a part of the Hanumanthanagar Campus and is located in 50 feet Road Hanumanthanagar. This is a Co-Education college. PESCP was established in the year 1982. The institute offers UG, PG courses, and research programs. PESCP is approved by AICTE, PCI, and NBA.

College_Summary: Meredian College, established in 1996, is a private college affiliated to Mangalore University and recognised by the government of Karnataka, located in the coastal city of Dwarakanagar, Mangalore, Karnataka. It offers various Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Diploma programs. Meredian College also provides good infrastructure and multiple facilities that includes hostels, cafeteria, library and quality placements for the students.

Admission to these courses is merit and entrance based. Applicants seeking admission to the institute may apply online as well as offline. The institute is well equipped with all the facilities with the motive of providing premier experience and learning to their students.

Aroor Laxminarayana Rao Memorial Ayurvedic Medical College and PG Centre were established in 1987 by Sri Aroor Ramesh Rao, a renowned industrialist, and social reformer. The college offers 4 courses in Medicine (Ayurvedic). It offers BAMS and MD courses in various specializations. Admission to these courses is based on both entrance and merit. The application mode is both online and offline.

College_Summary: Sri Jagadguru Balagangadharanatha Swamy College of Nursing, also known as SJB College of Nursing was established in 2003 in Bangalore. The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses across Nursing. Additionally, the institute also offers a diploma course in General Nursing & Midwifery. Admissions are granted on the basis of merit of last qualifying examinations. Students can avail a plethora of facilities from the college.

College_Name: Kidwai Memorial Institute of Oncology - [KMIO], Bangalore
College_Summary: Kidwai Memorial Institute of Oncology, shortly referred to as KMIO, was established in 1973 in Bangalore. The courses offered at the institute i.e. B.Sc, M.Sc, DNB, Specialty PG, and Super Speciality PG are affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences. Admissions to courses are done on the basis of entrance examinations, counseling sessions, or interviews, differing as per the course. These are conducted by either the affiliating RGUHS or by NBE. The applicants are required to apply online through the official website for the admission process.

The college offers a wide variety of UG and PG courses across 8 streams, namely Arts, Banking and Commerce, Management, law media, and Mass Communication, Vocational, Science, Design. Admission to its courses is based on the candidate’s performance in his/her last qualifying examination. The institute also provides one year of regular certificate courses under STAEC.

Nursing, GNM Nursing. Admission based on candidate’s performance in National Eligibility cum Entrance Test Undergraduate (NEET-UG) for Graduation and NEET PG for Post- Graduation. The application mode is online.

College_Summary: Adichunchanagiri College Of Nursing is situated in Mandya, Karnataka, India. Established in 1995, the institute is affiliated with Adichunchanagiri University. The college offers 10 courses in the streams of Nursing, Medical and Paramedical with degrees GNM, B.Sc., M.Sc. and Post basic B.Sc. Admission to the courses is granted based on marks secured in previous qualifying examinations. Application mode is online.

College_Name: Tipu Sultan Unani Medical College and Hospital
College_Summary: Tipu Sultan Unani Medical College and Hospital was established in 1988 in Gulbarga, Karnataka. Affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, the institute offers a full-time Bachelor of Unani Medicine and Surgery (BUMS) degree. Admission to its BUMS course is based on the candidate’s performance in the NEET examination followed by NEET Ayush Karnataka State Counselling. To be eligible for the admission process, candidates must have passed 10+2 with a minimum of 50% marks in Physics, Chemistry, and Biology.

Rajiv Gandhi College of Nursing, Bangalore
College_Summary: Rajiv Gandhi College of Nursing, Bangalore is a private nursing institute established in the year 2002. It is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore, and recognized by the Indian Nursing Council (INC). The college offers B.Sc. Nursing, Post B.Sc. Nursing, M.Sc. Nursing and General Nursing and Midwifery. The campus is well-equipped with good academic & student-centric facilities. Pass-outs of the college are well-placed in Government and industry-leading multi-specialty hospitals.

Poornaprajna College is situated in Udupi in the state of Karnataka and is popularly known as PPC. It is a private college, that was established in 1960 and is run by Sri Admar Mutt Education Council. The college was awarded 3.19 CGPA by the NAAC. The college was also awarded Udupi Chamber of Commerce Award of Excellence.

College_Name: HKES Homoeopathic Medical College & Hospital, Gulbarga

College_Summary: Established in the year 2003, the private Akshaya College of Nursing, Tumkur, Karnataka offers an excellent education to nursing aspirants. The Private college provides courses like B.Sc, M.Sc, GNM. The admission to these courses is based on merit. The Master Of Science (M.Sc) Nursing program recognizes 5 specialities namely Community Health Nursing, Medical-Surgical Nursing, Obstetrics & Gynecology Nursing, Psychiatric nursing, Pediatric Nursing to inculcate quality rehabilitative services and qualities in the nursing students. Application mode is online.

SSSIHMS Bangalore offers free of cost education to students enrolled in all the courses offered by the institute. The institute collaborates with repeated R & D organizations such as the CSIR for the advancement of clinical science, thus, offering an excellent platform for research opportunities for students and professionals from all over the country.

The college has been approved by the Central Council of Indian Medicine, New Delhi. The college offers medical courses in UG and PG levels. Admissions for the UG course are based on the NEET for the undergraduate course while admission for the PG course is based on the AIAPGET exam.
